services.title: Home Visits
services.description: We provide home visit services through our specialized medical team, wherever you are. Whether you need to follow up on a health condition, provide treatment, post-operative care, or even monitor chronic diseases, we come to you with all the necessary medical equipment to ensure your comfort and safety in your home.

services.title: Medical Consultations
services.description: Thanks to our network of general practitioners, you can easily get a medical consultation: remotely via video or phone call, to save time and reduce the hassle of travel, or in person at our centers or at home when needed, ensuring the highest levels of medical quality.

services.title: Patient Accompaniment
services.description: No need to worry about your transportation. We provide you with a personal accompaniment service to hospitals and clinics, including: organizing safe transportation, administrative support during medical registration, and the presence of the companion with the patient during examinations or medical appointments.

services.title: Appointment Management
services.description: We professionally manage all your medical appointments. From booking consultations to coordinating examination and operation appointments: appointment reminders, selecting the most suitable doctors and centers according to the case, and precise time management to avoid long waiting.

services.title: Surgery Financing
services.description: Because health doesn't wait, we help you finance the costs of surgical operations through flexible and quick solutions, including: payment plans suitable for your capabilities, partnerships with accredited health financing institutions, and guidance and accompaniment in all stages of treatment financing until complete recovery.

faqs.question: How can I schedule a home visit?
faqs.answer: You can schedule an appointment by calling us directly, sending an email, or filling out the contact form on our website. Our team will contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.

faqs.question: What geographic areas do you cover?
faqs.answer: We mainly cover the Gafsa and Sousse regions, as well as their surroundings within a 50 km radius. For more distant areas, please contact us to check availability.

faqs.question: How does the surgery financing service work?
faqs.answer: Our financing service evaluates your financial and medical situation to propose a suitable payment plan. We work with several financial institutions to offer advantageous rates and flexible terms.

faqs.question: Are remote consultations covered by insurance?
faqs.answer: It depends on your insurance. Many insurance companies now cover teleconsultations. We can provide you with all the necessary documents for your reimbursement request.

faqs.question: What is the timeframe for obtaining an urgent consultation?
faqs.answer: For non-vital emergencies, we can usually arrange a consultation within 2 to 4 hours. For vital emergencies, please contact emergency services directly at 190.

sections.title: Prevention and Wellness
content: Prevention is a key element in maintaining good health. Adopting a healthy lifestyle can significantly reduce the risk of developing chronic diseases.
A balanced diet rich in fruits and vegetables, regular physical activity, quality sleep, and stress management are the pillars of good health.
Regular preventive medical examinations help detect potential health problems early and intervene before they become serious.

sections.title: Chronic Diseases
content: Chronic diseases such as diabetes, hypertension, heart or respiratory diseases require regular medical monitoring and daily management.
Adherence to prescribed treatment, following medical recommendations, and adopting an adapted lifestyle are essential for living well with a chronic disease.
Our team can support you in managing your chronic disease, in coordination with your primary care physician.

sections.title: Elderly Care
content: Aging often comes with specific health and daily care needs.
Fall prevention, medication management, maintaining autonomy, and cognitive stimulation are important aspects of elderly care.
Our home care services are specially designed to meet the needs of the elderly, allowing them to stay in their familiar environment while receiving professional care.
